message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget constraints.
I understand you have a budget constraint, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1300000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1150000 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1150000. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to stay close to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $1250000.
I appreciate your willingness to give me a slight discount, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1180000 for the product. Can we meet in the middle again?

I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to give you a bit more room to work with, but I'm not going to go below $1200000. I'm counteroffering at $1220000.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still a bit away from my budget. I'm willing to pay $1190000 for the product. Can we meet in the middle one last time?
